Issue.creator: smithbk
Issue.summary: fabric-ca-client enroll -u option ignored when config file already exists
Issue.description: " command twice with two different values. The first one creates the config file with the 1st URL. When you run the command with a different URL on the command line, it uses the stored in the config file rather than the one from the command line arg. The command line arg should override what is in the config file. >
